about.description:
It turns out that many projects need to parse executable formats and they usually re-implement
their own parser. Moreover these parsers are usually bound to one language.
LIEF attempts to fill this void.
about.summary: A cross platform library to parse, modify and abstract ELF, PE and MachO formats.

name: py-lief
raw_recipe:
# This file created by conda-build 3.20.2
# ------------------------------------------------

package:
    name: py-lief
    version: 0.10.1
source:
    -   fn: lief-0.10.1.tar.gz
        patches:
            - 0001-python-Only-pass-NODEFAULTLIB-MSVCRT-when-not-BUILD_.patch
            - 0002-Fix-typo-BuildeVersion-BuildVersion-which-may-lead-t.patch
            - 0003-Export-BuildToolVersion.patch
            - 0004-Do-not-annotate-static-ELF-Parser-s-parse-function-a.patch
            - 0005-Update-LIEF_VERSION_PATCH-to-1-for-v0.10.1.patch
            - 0006-Call-the-C-DLL-libLIEF.dll-so-it-does-not-clash-with.patch
            - 0007-Add-LIEFOptions-for-BUILD_STATIC_LIBS-and-BUILD_SHAR.patch
            - 0008-Add-_DEBUG-when-CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE-matches-Debug.patch
            - 0009-Avoid-deprecated-get_config_var-SO-use-EXT_SUFFIX-lo.patch
            - 0010-Fix-module-entry-point-declaration.patch
        sha256: 6f30c98a559f137e08b25bcbb376c0259914b33c307b8b901e01ca952241d00a
        url: https://github.com/lief-project/LIEF/archive/0.10.1.tar.gz
build:
    ignore_run_exports:
        - python
    number: 1
    run_exports:
        - py-lief >=0.10.1,<0.11.0a0
    string: py37hdadc0f0_1
requirements:
    build:
        - bzip2 1.0.8 haf1e3a3_3
        - c-ares 1.16.1 haf1e3a3_3
        - ca-certificates 2020.6.20 hecda079_0
        - ccache 3.7.11 h9df614a_0
        - cctools 949.0.1 h22b1bf0_7
        - cctools_osx-64 949.0.1 h5ba7a2e_7
        - clang 10.0.1 default_hf57f61e_1
        - clang_osx-64 10.0.1 h05bbb7f_9
        - clangxx 10.0.1 default_hf57f61e_1
        - clangxx_osx-64 10.0.1 h05bbb7f_9
        - cmake 3.18.2 h9f6fb0d_0
        - compiler-rt 10.0.1 he6db49b_0
        - compiler-rt_osx-64 10.0.1 h033240e_0
        - expat 2.2.9 hb1e8313_2
        - krb5 1.17.1 h75d18d8_3
        - ld64 530 7
        - ld64_osx-64 530 h3c32e8a_7
        - libclang-cpp10 10.0.1 default_hf57f61e_1
        - libcurl 7.71.1 h9bf37e3_6
        - libcxx 10.0.1 h5f48129_0
        - libedit 3.1.20191231 h0678c8f_2
        - libev 4.33 haf1e3a3_1
        - libiconv 1.16 haf1e3a3_0
        - libllvm10 10.0.1 h009f743_3
        - libnghttp2 1.41.0 h7580e61_2
        - libssh2 1.9.0 h8a08a2b_5
        - libuv 1.39.0 haf1e3a3_0
        - llvm-tools 10.0.1 h1341992_3
        - ncurses 6.2 hb1e8313_1
        - ninja 1.10.1 h879752b_1
        - openssl 1.1.1g haf1e3a3_1
        - pkg-config 0.29.2 hdc84dc8_1006
        - rhash 1.3.6 h1de35cc_1001
        - tapi 1000.10.8 h879752b_4
        - tk 8.6.10 hb0a8c7a_0
        - xz 5.2.5 haf1e3a3_1
        - zlib 1.2.11 h7795811_1009
    host:
        - ca-certificates 2020.6.20 hecda079_0
        - certifi 2020.6.20 py37hc8dfbb8_0
        - libcxx 10.0.1 h5f48129_0
        - libffi 3.2.1 hb1e8313_1007
        - liblief 0.10.1 hb1e8313_1
        - ncurses 6.2 hb1e8313_1
        - openssl 1.1.1g haf1e3a3_1
        - pip 20.2.3 py_0
        - python 3.7.8 hc9dea61_1_cpython
        - python_abi 3.7 1_cp37m
        - readline 8.0 h0678c8f_2
        - setuptools 49.6.0 py37hc8dfbb8_1
        - sqlite 3.33.0 h960bd1c_0
        - tk 8.6.10 hb0a8c7a_0
        - wheel 0.35.1 pyh9f0ad1d_0
        - xz 5.2.5 haf1e3a3_1
        - zlib 1.2.11 h7795811_1009
    run:
        - libcxx >=10.0.1
        - liblief 0.10.1 hb1e8313_1
        - python >=3.7,<3.8.0a0
        - python_abi 3.7.* *_cp37m
test:
    imports:
        - lief
    requires:
        - clangxx_osx-64 10.*
about:
    description: 'It turns out that many projects need to parse executable formats
        and they usually re-implement

        their own parser. Moreover these parsers are usually bound to one language.

        LIEF attempts to fill this void.

        '
    doc_source_url: https://github.com/lief-project/LIEF/tree/master/doc
    doc_url: https://lief.quarkslab.com/doc/stable/index.html
    home: https://lief.quarkslab.com/
    license: Apache-2.0
    license_family: Apache
    license_file: LICENSE
    summary: A cross platform library to parse, modify and abstract ELF, PE and MachO
        formats.
extra:
    copy_test_source_files: true
    final: true
    recipe-maintainers:
        - isuruf
        - mingwandroid
        - msarahan

about.description:
It turns out that many projects need to parse executable formats and they usually re-implement
their own parser. Moreover these parsers are usually bound to one language.
LIEF attempts to fill this void.
about.summary: A cross platform library to parse, modify and abstract ELF, PE and MachO formats.
